headline: Ventilators Company Evaluation Report 2025 - ResMed, Getinge, and Philips Lead the Ventilator Market Through Innovation, Strong Global Presence, and Strategic Use of Technology and Partnerships
summary: The Ventilator Companies Quadrant offers an in-depth analysis of the global ventilators market, spotlighting top players like ResMed, Getinge AB, and Koninklijke Philips N.V. This report highlights technological advancements in portable ventilators and sensor tech, driven by rising preterm births, aging demographics, increasing respiratory ailments, and growing home oxygen therapy preferences. Key players are shaping the market through innovation, strategic partnerships, and global expansion. De
